rows.label: bf03150100_0010
rows.name:
You got it after seeing it once.
Not bad.

rows.label: bf03150100_0020
rows.name: Heheheh.

rows.label: bf03150100_0030
rows.name:
Listen up.
Drivers use Arts.

rows.label: bf03150100_0040
rows.name:
It's not just about Arts that 
rely on your Blade's power.

rows.label: bf03150100_0050
rows.name:
There are Arts that use your own strength,
or take advantage of your enemy's.

rows.label: bf03150100_0060
rows.name: There are many different kinds of Arts.

rows.label: bf03150100_0070
rows.name:
A Driver's job is to be smart with his
Arts, and protect his Blade.

rows.label: bf03150100_0080
rows.name: Protect my Blade?

rows.label: bf03150100_0090
rows.name:
That's right. 
Don't rely completely on your Blade.

rows.label: bf03150100_0100
rows.name:
Always be conscious 
of the power flowing to you.

rows.label: bf03150100_0110
rows.name:
Don't waste it, channel it through
your Arts, and protect her.

rows.label: bf03150100_0120
rows.name:
If you can do that, 
that's when you become a full-fledged Driver.

rows.label: bf03150100_0130
rows.name:
A 'full-fledged Driver', huh...
That seems so far away.

rows.label: bf03150100_0140
rows.name: Not necessarily.

rows.label: bf03150100_0150
rows.name:
That thing from before?
Took me five years to learn that.

rows.label: bf03150100_0160
rows.name: Five years?!

rows.label: bf03150100_0170
rows.name:
Yeah. But you mastered it
just by seeing it once.

rows.label: bf03150100_0180
rows.name:
Nia and Tora's moves supporting you are
quite impressive too, I must say.

rows.label: bf03150100_0190
rows.name: You lot have real potential, you know?

rows.label: bf03150100_0200
rows.name: I think I'm gonna spew.

rows.label: bf03150100_0210
rows.name: Biggipon has scary face, but he very nice!

rows.label: bf03150100_0220
rows.name: Only just now figured that out?
